statements: SELECT client_id, client_name, service_rendered, billable_hours, total_cost FROM legal_billing;
SELECT client_name, total_cost, hourly_rate, service_rendered, billable_hours FROM legal_billing;
SELECT client_id, client_name, billable_hours, total_cost, hourly_rate FROM legal_billing;
SELECT service_rendered, client_name, total_cost FROM legal_billing WHERE hourly_rate > 100;
SELECT client_id, client_name, service_rendered, billable_hours FROM legal_billing WHERE total_cost < 500.00;
SELECT client_name, service_rendered, total_cost FROM legal_billing WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM legal_billing WHERE billable_hours > 5
SELECT client_name, service_rendered, hourly_rate, total_cost FROM legal_billing WHERE total_cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000
SELECT client_name, billable_hours, hourly_rate, total_cost FROM legal_billing WHERE hourly_rate >= 50 ORDER BY client_name
SELECT client_id, client_name, service_rendered, total_cost FROM legal_billing WHERE service_rendered LIKE '%litigation%'
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE id = 5;
SELECT client_name, service_description FROM billing ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoicing WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT client_name, invoice_date FROM invoicing WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT client_name, total_amount FROM invoicing ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT client_name, amount FROM billing WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT client_name, invoice_date FROM invoicing WHERE invoice_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, client_name, amount FROM billing WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoicing ORDER BY invoice_date ASC
SELECT * FROM billing_invoices;
SELECT client_id, service_description, amount FROM billing_invoices WHERE client_id = 1001;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_invoices GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT service_name, service_rate FROM services ORDER BY service_rate DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_address, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM billing_invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_id DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_address FROM clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_rate FROM services WHERE service_category = 'IT Services' ORDER BY service_rate DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, client_id, amount FROM billing_invoices WHERE client_id = 1001 AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM billing_invoices JOIN clients ON billing_invoices.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE clients.client_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM billing_info ORDER BY bill_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_info WHERE client_phone = '+123456789';
SELECT service_name, service_rate FROM legal_services WHERE service_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM invoice_info WHERE invoice_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;
SELECT client_name, invoice_amount FROM client_info JOIN invoice_info ON client_info.client_id = invoice_info.client_id;
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_info WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_rate FROM legal_services ORDER BY service_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoice_info WHERE invoice_amount > 1000 AND invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.client_name, b.bill_amount, i.invoice_amount FROM client_info c INNER JOIN billing_info b ON c.client_id = b.client_id INNER JOIN invoice_info i ON b.bill_id = i.bill_id;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, rate FROM services ORDER BY rate DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM invoices WHERE client_id = 2 AND amount > 100;
SELECT client_id, invoice_id, payment_id, billing_date FROM billing_history WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, address FROM clients WHERE client_id > 3 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT clients.client_name, services.service_name, invoices.amount FROM clients JOIN invoices ON clients.client_id = invoices.client_id JOIN services ON invoices.service_id = services.service_id;
SELECT clients.client_name, SUM(invoices.amount) AS total_amount FROM clients JOIN invoices ON clients.client_id = invoices.client_id GROUP BY clients.client_name;

SELECT clients.client_name, services.service_name, invoices.amount FROM clients LEFT JOIN invoices ON clients.client_id = invoices.client_id LEFT JOIN services ON invoices.service_id = services.service_id WHERE invoices.status = 'PAID' ORDER BY invoices.amount DESC;
